attributes.action: Support the full use of body scanners at all U.K Airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The scanners in question seem to be nothing other than hi-tech x-ray machines, so what if airport staff see what gender we are, big or small, when they'll see thousands of us weekly? If it takes another 30 minutes? I know I can speak for all of us and say we would prefer to board/depart that plane safe in the mind that the security has done the very best that it can with the given technology for us all.
